description: Try our easy to follow Lime Pickle recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pickles,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Lime Pickle Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Put the limes into a sterilized jar and cover with the salt. Dry-fry the fenugreek and mustard seeds in a small skillet, and then grind them to a powder. Add the ground seeds, chili powder, and turmeric to the limes and mix well.
Heat the oil in a small skillet until smoking, add the asafetida and fry for 30 seconds. Pour the oil over the limes and mix well.
Cover the jar with a clean cloth and allow to mature for 10 days in a bright, warm place.
Transfer the pickle to a tightly covered container and store for up to 2 months.
